name: Nature's Path Organic Brown Sugar Maple Instant Oatmeal, 11.3 oz (Pack of 1), Gluten Free, Non-GMO
short_description: Contains: 1 Box of Nature's Path Brown Sugar Maple Instant Oatmeal, 11.3 ounces

All of our recipes are carefully crafted with only certified USDA organic and Non-GMO ingredients, so that mindful eaters can enjoy a deliciously nutritious oats, with no artificial colors, flavors and preservatives.
8 single-serve packets of quick cooking gluten free oats, and a carefully crafted blend of amaranth, quinoa and sorghum, and organically sweetened.

Eating whole grains is an essential part of a healthy diet. Whole grain oats are great because of their high fiber levels, and also because they contain loads of antioxidant creating phytochemicals. They’re also an excellent source of vitamins and minerals.
Good nutrition is made easy with gluten free oatmeal containing 31g whole grains and 4g protein
Our planet, our food and our bodies are all connected. Being mindful about your food and choosing to eat organic means you’re making the best choice for your health, and our planet.
product_description: 8 single-serve packets of quick cooking gluten free oats, and a carefully crafted blend of amaranth, quinoa and sorghum, and organically sweetened. We’ve always thought organic oats were a great way to start the day – super healthy whole grains that keep you full. These single-serve packs are portion controlled so you can have a quick and easy breakfast (or day-time snack!). Simply add hot water and stir. Let it sit for a couple of minutes and you’re ready to enjoy. Or try them with our overnight oats recipe on the back of pack for an easy option you can grab and go. Packed full of whole grains, high in fiber, and a good source of protein, Nature’s Path organic oatmeal products are both tasty and healthy. Whether it’s our plain, original oats you like the best, or any one of our delicious flavor blends, all Nature’s Path boxes of oatmeal are filled with only simple, whole food, organic and non-GMO ingredients.

name: Modern Oats Vermont Maple Instant Oatmeal Cups with Lid, Gluten-Free, Vegan, Non-GMO Oatmeal with Protein & Fiber, Breakfast On the Go, Whole Grain Oats with Real Vermont Maple Sugar & Seeds, 2.6oz (Pack of 12)
short_description: Maple-Sweetened Oatmeal with Protein & Fiber: With 7g of protein and 5g of fiber per cup, this hearty blend delivers clean energy and satisfying nutrition to keep you fueled throughout the day.

Made with Real Vermont Maple Sugar: Sourced straight from Vermont sugar shacks, this oatmeal is naturally sweetened with pure maple sugar, no added flavors, no shortcuts—just authentic, cozy maple taste in every bite.

Certified Vegan, Gluten-Free & Non-GMO: Crafted with care using pesticide-free whole rolled oats and a blend of pumpkin seeds, sunflower seeds, and chia. Certified vegan, gluten-free, kosher, and non-GMO for a better-for-you breakfast.

Two Ways to Enjoy – Instant Hot or Cold Overnight Oats. For Instant Hot oatmeal, add hot water to cover oats, cover with lid, steep for 3 minutes, stir and savor. For cold overnight, Add milk or a milk substitute, cover with provided lid and refrigerate overnight for a creamy, chilled oatmeal you can grab and go in the morning.

Warm Flavor, Clean Ingredients – This delicious oatmeal is lightly sweetened with Vermont Pure maple sugar and includes pumpkin seeds, sunflower seeds, and chia seeds. Then it's spiced with a touch of cinnamon and cardamom for a naturally delicious taste—free from artificial ingredients or preservatives.

A good source of fiber, Quaker Maple & Brown Sugar Organic Instant Oatmeal is hearty and healthy. It only takes a few minutes to prepare, and individual packets are already measured for the recommended serving size. Just add water or milk and heat for an easy breakfast choice of organic oats and flavorful maple and brown sugar.

product_description: Who are we? Well, we seek out the finest natural and organic foods available, maintain the strictest quality standards in the industry, and have an unshakeable commitment to sustainable agriculture. We ban 300+ ingredients from all food that we sell, including hydrogenated fats, high-fructose corn syrup and sweeteners such as aspartame, sucralose and saccharin, so you can skip deciphering ingredient labels and cut to relishing your finds. Our 365 by Whole Foods Market brand offers over 2,500 affordably priced and thoughtfully sourced products that not only meet our already strict standards, but also in many cases go above and beyond what we require of other brands.

name: Bob's Red Mill Instant Oatmeal, Maple Brown Sugar, 6 Packets Total, Non-GMO, Gluten Free, Whole Grain
short_description: GOOD MORNINGS MADE SIMPLE: Bob’s Red Mill Maple Brown Sugar Instant Oatmeal is made with Bob’s Signature Oat Blend—whole grain rolled oats, quick oats, Scottish oats and oat bran—for a deliciously creamy texture and hearty flavor; four packets per box

HOMEMADE IN HALF THE TIME: Enjoy scratch-quality oatmeal in just three minutes; these convenient single-serve packets make it easy to fuel your day with a warm, nourishing breakfast at home, at work or on the go

GOOD SOURCE OF FIBER WITH 5 G PROTEIN: Each serving is a good source of fiber, helping to keep you feeling full and satisfied throughout your morning—whether you're heading into a busy day or hitting the trails

GLUTEN FREE & NON-GMO: Made with gluten free oats and Non-GMO Project Verified ingredients, this oatmeal is a simple, delicious option for those with dietary preferences or anyone seeking a wholesome breakfast

MAKE IT YOUR OWN: Enjoy it straight from the packet or customize with your favorite toppings—fresh berries, nuts, a drizzle of maple syrup or a sprinkle of cinnamon—for a breakfast as unique as your day
product_description: Good mornings are made simple with Bob’s Red Mill Maple Brown Sugar Instant Oatmeal. Crafted with real maple sugar and Bob’s Signature Four Oat Blend—featuring whole grain rolled oats, quick oats, Scottish oats and oat bran—this premium instant oatmeal delivers scratch-quality texture and flavor in minutes. In just three minutes, serve up a thick, creamy bowl with just the right balance of chewiness and cozy comfort. Made with 100% whole grains, it’s a nourishing way to fuel your day with 5 grams of protein. Each packet is a good source of fiber, helping you feel full and satisfied. Enjoy on its own or customize with your favorite toppings like fresh fruit, nuts or a drizzle of honey. Whether at home, at work or on the trail, these convenient single-serve packets bring wholesome goodness wherever the day takes you. Bob’s Red Mill makes it easier than ever to enjoy the World’s Best Oatmeal.
